title: Drawing, "Design for Ark Curtain with Crest, for a St. Louiis Synagogue", 1950
medium: Cut paper and brush and gouache on silver patterned paper with a cut paper overlay
inscribed: Inscribed in blue ballpoint pen, on old mat below lower left corner of drawing:  St. Louis/Curtain:  "Crest"; below lower right corner of drawing:  T. Guermonprez.  Typed on gold label affixed to verso, upper left:  Trude Guermonprez/Pond Farm/Guerneville, Cal.; in blue pen at lower right of label:  Aug 6th 1950.
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Collage of seven-branched menorah encircled by wreath.  Inscribed on base of menorah in red, 5 Hebrew characters (to be translated).  Gray paper screen of horizontal and vertical lines overlays design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Ark Curtain with Crest, for a St. Louiis Synagogue", 1950.
1950. Cut paper and brush and gouache on silver patterned paper with a cut paper overlay. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-42.
